name: nyiso-microprediction
description: A simple lambda function to pull electricity load numbers into Microprediction.org

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && webpack  --config webpack.config.js && zip -r dist.zip dist/ && aws s3 cp dist.zip s3://microprediction-lambda/dist.zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name nyiso-pull --s3-bucket microprediction-lambda --s3-key dist.zip --publish

author: Rusty Conover <rusty@conover.me>
